official_title: Promoting Resilience in Early Survivorship Among Adolescents and Young Adults With Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* All genders ≥ 12 and ≤ 25 years of age at baseline
* Participant is able to speak English or Spanish language (for PRISM sessions)
* Participant is able to read English or Spanish language (for completion of surveys)
* Participant is cognitively able to participate in PRISM sessions and complete written questionnaires and surveys, as judged by the site investigator
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 12 Years
Must have maximum age of 25 Years
miscellaneous_criteria: Participants that have completed their main cancer-directed therapy at one of the study sites affiliated centers who meet all the eligibility criteria will be eligible for participation in this study.
